svg.script: function go() { document.documentElement.pauseAnimations(); // Force a sample after starting the bottom animation, but before starting // the top animation. document.documentElement.setCurrentTime(0.5); // Sample again after the top animation has started document.documentElement.setCurrentTime(1); // Remove top animation var anim = document.getElementById("anim"); anim.parentNode.removeChild(anim); // Sample again document.documentElement.setCurrentTime(1); document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }
